UX-16-2.notes: Collapsible nav (280px→56px) with toggle button and localStorage persistence, collapsible context panel with close button and localStorage, segmented control replacing ghost buttons for view switching (Table/Kanban/Tree/Graph), breadcrumb bar below content-header updated by filterByArea(), content-header already sticky (verified). UX-16-3.notes: Component polish complete: form success state (green border/shadow), modal exit animation (modalOut/overlayOut keyframes), focus trap (Tab/Shift+Tab cycle), Escape key close, overlay click close, focus return to trigger, unified .card base class with hover shadow, toast upgraded to stacking queue with icons/dismiss/progress bar. Existing features verified: btn focus-visible/disabled/loading/outline/danger, badge colored dots and pulse, dashboard-card hover. File: .governance/static/index.html

UX-16-4.notes: AG Grid enhancements: expanded CSS variable overrides for light+dark, colored left border per row via data-status attribute (pending=warning, in_progress=primary, done=success, failed=danger), icon prefix in status cell renderer, action buttons replaced with icon buttons (claim=⤓, complete=✓, view=👁) shown on row hover, debounced quick filter input (250ms) above grid with result count. File: .governance/static/index.html

UX-16-5.notes: Dashboard KPI redesign: cards with accent borders (warning/primary/danger/success), trend arrows (up/down/steady with color), SVG sparklines via inline polyline for pending/progress/blocked with localStorage history (8 samples), progress ring SVG with animated stroke-dashoffset showing completion %, critical path items clickable with status badges opening packet viewer. File: .governance/static/index.html

UX-16-6.notes: Command palette: Ctrl+K/Cmd+K overlay with fuzzy matching, highlighted chars, arrow key navigation, Enter to execute, Escape to close, 14 registered commands (nav/view/action/settings). Keyboard shortcuts: ? for help overlay, g+d go to dashboard, g+w go to WBS manager, n new item, r refresh, Escape close overlays. Shortcuts skip when focus in input/textarea. File: .governance/static/index.html

UX-16-7.notes: View transitions: fadeIn CSS animation applied via showViewWithTransition() on all view switches. Button loading: setButtonLoading() utility with spinner+disabled state, wired into submitAction() claim/done flow. File: .governance/static/index.html

UX-16-8.notes: Terminal enhancement complete: draggable resize handle with mousedown/mousemove/mouseup and localStorage height persistence, colored output rendering ([OK] green, [ERR] red, [WARN] amber via innerHTML spans), green $ prompt prefix, inline ghost completion, dropdown autocomplete list with arrow key navigation and Tab/Escape handling, JetBrains Mono already applied. UX-16-9.notes:
Accessibility baseline complete. Implemented:
- Skip link: Present at line 681 with keyboard focus styling
- ARIA landmark roles: navigation (683), main (693), complementary (916)

- Modal accessibility: 11 dialogs with role=dialog and aria-modal=true (9 modals + command palette + shortcut help)
- Modal close buttons: aria-label on all 9 modal close buttons
- Toast aria-live: polite + atomic on toast-container (1298)
- Terminal aria-live: already present on terminal-output (952)
- Focus trap: Extended to cover modals, command palette, and shortcut help (2021-2037)
- Focus return: Already implemented on modal close (1998)
- Escape key: Universal handler for all modals, command palette, and shortcut help (2005-2015)
- Command palette: role=dialog, aria-modal, aria-label, options with role=option and aria-selected
- Tab navigation: All interactive elements keyboard accessible

Next.js app shell complete with full page routing. Implemented:

Layout & Shell:

API Integration:

- Typed responses with proper error handling
- Loading states and error boundaries
- Refresh functionality on all pages

Component Usage:

Navigation:

- Active route highlighting
- Responsive collapse/expand with aria-expanded
- Back navigation on detail pages

✅ API client integration functional

- Area 16.0: 14/14 packets complete (100%)
